PHASE SUMMARY — Danglars — early

Role: Danglars is a crew member on the ship and a witness to the events surrounding Captain Leclere's death.

Traits: 
- Unprepossessing countenance (not very attractive or impressive appearance)
- Obsequious (eager to please or obedient)

Relationships:
- Interacts with the owner, Morrel
- Interacts with Dantes
- Interacts with Danglars (it is unclear if this is the same person or a different one, but the name is repeated)

Notable behaviors:
- Retreats a step or two when Dantes approaches
- Turns very red when questioned about knowing about a packet left by Dantes at Porto-Ferrajo
